member.summary: Source address

member.summary: Destination address

member.name: T:Lykke.Service.PayInternal.Client.Models.Transfer.TransferCrosswiseModel
member.summary: Represents the minimal set of data for creation of the crosswise transfer request.

member.name: P:Lykke.Service.PayInternal.Client.Models.Transfer.TransferCrosswiseModel.MerchantId
member.summary: ID of the Merchant who is responsible for money transfer.

member.name: P:Lykke.Service.PayInternal.Client.Models.Transfer.TransferCrosswiseModel.Sources
member.summary: The side who pays the fee. If Merchant pays, then the Client receives the full sum of money as it is pointed in request for the transfer, and the fee is additionaly paid from Merchant's wallets(s). Alternatively, the Client gets his (money - fee), and the Merchant is not responsible for anything.

member.name: P:Lykke.Service.PayInternal.Client.Models.Transfer.TransferCrosswiseModel.Destinations
member.summary: The list of destination addresses, (supposably) belonging to the Client.

member.summary: ID of the transfer.

member.summary: List of transfer-related transactions.

member.summary: Current aggregate transfer state info.

member.summary: Current aggregate status error info (if there is an error).

member.summary: Transfer creation date.

member.name: P:Lykke.Service.PayInternal.Client.Models.Transfer.TransferRequest.MerchantId
member.summary: ID of the merchant who initiated the transfer.

member.summary: The transfer request data for the case when we need to perform multiple bijective operations (i.e., from each of the sources we will transfer money to the single destination).

member.summary: ID of the Merchant who is responsible for money transfer.

member.summary: The list of pair addresses for source-destination with the amount of transfer specified.

member.name: T:Lykke.Service.PayInternal.Client.Models.Transfer.TransferStatus
member.summary: Transfer Status

member.name: F:Lykke.Service.PayInternal.Client.Models.Transfer.TransferStatus.InProgress
member.summary: In Progress. The status apply if the transaction was registred in blockchain successful

member.name: F:Lykke.Service.PayInternal.Client.Models.Transfer.TransferStatus.Completed
member.summary: Completed. The status apply when PRC transaction does have enought comfirmations

member.name: F:Lykke.Service.PayInternal.Client.Models.Transfer.TransferStatus.Error
member.summary: Error. The status apply when somthing wrong happens

member.name: T:Lykke.Service.PayInternal.Client.Models.Transfer.TransferStatusError
member.summary: Transfer status error. If Transfer status is error, the property describe why. If status is not Error - None present.

member.name: F:Lykke.Service.PayInternal.Client.Models.Transfer.TransferStatusError.None
member.summary: No errors. If status of transaction request is not Error.

member.name: F:Lykke.Service.PayInternal.Client.Models.Transfer.TransferStatusError.NotConfirmed
member.summary: Transaction is not confirmed.

member.name: F:Lykke.Service.PayInternal.Client.Models.Transfer.TransferStatusError.InvalidAmount
member.summary: Show invalid amount. Means source wallets could have not enought amount or amount is not enought to pay fee.

member.name: F:Lykke.Service.PayInternal.Client.Models.Transfer.TransferStatusError.InvalidAddress
member.summary: Invalid address.

member.name: F:Lykke.Service.PayInternal.Client.Models.Transfer.TransferStatusError.InternalError
member.summary: Any other errors. Take a look thow the logs.

member.summary: ID of the transfer to update.

member.summary: The new state of the transfer.

member.summary: The new error info of the transfer.
